snippet.title: MLB 08 The Show (PS2) - Gameplay
snippet.description:
A full game of the PlayStation 2 version of MLB 08: The Show, a baseball video game by Sony and San Diego Studio. Colorado Rockies at Detroit Tigers. This game was also released on PS3 and PSP. 

How did this 2008 Tigers team not win a trillion games with that lineup? They look so stacked. 

00:00 Setup
00:50 Pregame starts
03:06 First pitch
34:54 A home run
49:34 A player gets ejected
1:03:40 Final out
